about_the_game: The Citroën C4 Rally was raced by Citroën from 2007 to 2010. It achieved overwhelming success at the hands of Sebastien Loeb and co-driver Daniel Elena. This is one of the most successful cars in rally history, and excels on all surfaces.
detailed_description: The Citroën C4 Rally was raced by Citroën from 2007 to 2010. It achieved overwhelming success at the hands of Sebastien Loeb and co-driver Daniel Elena. This is one of the most successful cars in rally history, and excels on all surfaces.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX4300 or Intel Core i3 2130
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD7750 or NVIDIA GTX650Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
